medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ and epigastric abdominal pain, worse over the past 5 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 weeks ago with intermittent abdominal pain and nausea, progressing to nearly constant discomfort over the past 5 days, associated with nausea and dry heaves. Patient experienced a 20lb weight loss due to nausea and not eating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus, hyperlipidemia, hypertension, low back pain, osteoarthritis.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gallbladder/pancreas problems. Has 1 sister with heart problems and 1 sister with kidney problems.
